Plot: A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.
Title: Dark Tide
Writer: Ronnie Christensen (screenplay), Amy Sorlie (screenplay), Amy Sorlie (story)
Actors: Halle Berry, Olivier Martinez, Sizwe Msutu, Mark Elderkin
